spatial_accuracy.notes: Major architectural failures: Door-to-living room transition is missing. Window placements on the bottom wall do not match the spacing indicated on the plan. Room proportions are vertically stretched.

structural_fidelity.notes: Utility room walls are partial/incomplete. Several walls lack continuous vertical extension. Missing floor texture transitions that define specific zones (tiled utility vs wood halls).

furniture_mapping.notes: The kitchen island/peninsula is missing. Dining table is undersized. Hallucinated seating elements placed in the center corridor area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with soft, diffuse lighting. Materials are well-defined though text labels are corrupted/hallucinated.

detected_errors.description: Missing kitchen peninsula/island and pantry wall segment.
WC and sink misplaced relative to the utility room corridor entrance.
Staircase orientation/start point is incorrectly rendered compared to the 2D 'UP' arrow.
Dining room area is disproportionately large compared to the kitchen footprint.
Hallucinated floating glass/transparent archway symbols above the interior walls.
Text distortion in the center of the render ('ITUnY TOOM').
